title:
What is the law in NC regarding filling of pet prescriptions?  Are vets allowed to force you to purchase medications from them or are they required to give you a written prescription if you ask for it?  



I have found that I can usually find my pets medications for as much as 80% cheaper from Costco and Petmedexpress.com, but have friends who have said their vet would not give them a written prescription when they asked.
